name: Brava

biography.description: Brava uses the Kludge Drone to sabotage enemy devices by either taking control of them or destroying them, providing a tactical advantage for her team.

gameplayTips: Use the Kludge Drone to disable or take over enemy gadgets, creating opportunities for your team.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the impact of sabotaged devices.
Deploy the drone strategically to avoid detection and ensure success.
